channel.title: Siskiyou County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Siskiyou County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 736
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 736 - CA-89/Lassen National Park/McCloud. This is the northern end of CA-89, which runs generally along the east side of the Sierra Nevada.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 745
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 745 - South Weed Blvd.

item.title: End US-97 South at I-5
item.description: End US-97 South at I-5 south onramp (Exit 747). Turn left for I-5 south to Redding. Turn left for the College of the Siskiyous.

item.title: US-97 South at Weed Blvd.
item.description: US-97 south at Weed Blvd. Use Weed Blvd. north (BL-5/CA-265) for I-5 to Yreka. Use Weed Blvd. south (BL-5/US-97) to continue on US-97 and for I-5 south to Redding.

item.title: US-97 South at CA-161
item.description: US-97 south at CA-161 east to Tulelake. Tulelake is 23 miles east of here.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching CA-161
item.description: US-97 south approaching CA-161 east to Tulelake. CA-161 parallels the Oregon-California border east across the Klamath Basin.
